p:
Type I interferons are key mediators in the control of arboviral infections
28 . A129 −/− mice lack functional type I interferon receptors and are therefore very susceptible to severe alphavirus infections
29 . They have been also used as a lethal model for alphavirus vaccine safety and challenge studies
25, 29, 30 . Here we evaluated the safety and efficacy of the live-attenuated MAYV/IRES vaccine in A129 −/− mice. Figure 8a shows the experimental scheme used.
